## Summary

Adds configurable branch name prefix for new workspaces. Users can now choose how branch names are prefixed when creating worktrees.

## Changes

- **New prefix modes**: GitHub username \(default\), git author name, static "feat", custom prefix, or no prefix
- **Global setting**: Configure default in Settings → Features → Branch Prefix
- **Per-project override**: Override global default in Project Settings → Branch Prefix
- **Precedence**: Project setting → Global setting → Default \(GitHub username\)
